subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Willie Ann Rucker left her three children with a baby sitter at home in Waterloo, Iowa, one day in 1979, and never returned. One of them was Jets cornerback David Barrett.
snippet: Willie Ann Rucker left her three children with a baby sitter at home in Waterloo, Iowa, one day in 1979, and never returned. One of them was Jets cornerback David Barrett.
